key_risks: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities due to reliance on cloud-based solutions
Customer concentration with significant revenue from a limited number of large clients
Economic sensitivity to downturns in core markets like automotive and aerospace
Intense competition from established players in simulation and HPC markets
Merger investigation regarding the fairness of the proposed sale to Siemens
controversies: Data breach leading to updated risk disclosures
Ongoing legal investigations into the Siemens merger deal
governance_issues: Concerns about fiduciary breaches and valuation in the Siemens merger deal
